issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Release
components.description: This component is used for issues related to releasing the product. Release notes, copying builds to the server, etc.

fields.description:
The SDK stable 2.1.0.GA download from staging does not include the ti.cloud and ti.cloudpush modules.

Steps to Reproduce:

1. Go to staging server.
2. Download latest stable sdk.

Actual Result:

sdk downloads with no modules.

Expected Result:

sdk should include modules
fields.summary: Staging: SDK 2.1.0.GA does not include modules
fields.environment:
SDK: 2.1.0.GA
Studio: 2.1.0
Server: Staging
OS: Windows 7, Snow Leopard

comments.body:
Closing as Fixed.

SDK: 2.1.0.GA
Server: Staging
Studio: 2.1.0
OS: Snow Leopard, Lion 10.7.4, Ubuntu 12.04, Windows 7
